description: This file defines a class RecursiveChunking that implements a text chunking strategy by recursively splitting text into chunks at natural break points such as newlines and periods. It is part of a larger document processing system, inheriting from ChunkingStrategy, and interacts with Document objects.

classes.name: RecursiveChunking
classes.description: A chunking strategy that recursively splits text into chunks based on natural break points, with configurable chunk size and overlap.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the RecursiveChunking with specified chunk size and overlap, with validation and warnings for parameter values.

methods.name: chunk
methods.description: Recursively splits a Document's content into smaller chunks based on natural break points, returning a list of Document objects.
